content:
Miami in April sounds like a great getaway!

I'd be happy to help you find the best dates to fly using your Delta SkyMiles. To do that, I'll need to know a bit more information from you. Could you please provide me with the following details:

1. Which city are you flying from to Miami (MIA)?
2. Do you have any flexibility in your travel dates, or do you need to fly on specific days?
3. Are you looking for a one-way or round-trip redemption?
4. Do you have a preferred time of day for your flight (morning, afternoon, evening)?
5. Are you willing to consider flying into Fort Lauderdale-Hollywood International Airport (FLL) instead of Miami International Airport (MIA), as it might offer more redemption options or better schedules?

Regarding your experience with United Airlines, that's great to hear! Their in-flight entertainment system has received positive reviews. It's always interesting to compare the services of different airlines and find what works best for you.

Once I have more information about your travel plans, I can help you find the best dates to redeem your Delta SkyMiles for a free domestic flight to Miami.
